actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Commodity Credit Corporation to finance export credit sales of agricultural commodities and to authorize non-market-economy countries to participate in certain programs of the Commodity Credit Corporation.

summary.text: Agricultural Trade Expansion Act - Amends the Food for Peace Act of 1966 to permit the Commodity Credit Corporation to finance export sales of agricultural commodities on credit terms in excess of three years, but not more than ten years. Exempts such sales from the requirement that exports be transported on privately owned United States - flag commercial vessels.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Commodity Credit Corporation to finance export credit sales of agricultural commodities and to authorize non-market-economy countries to participate in certain programs of the Commodity Credit Corporation.
